item.title: Komito Analytics
item.description: Komito Analytics is an enhancement for the most popular web analytics software.
item.content:encoded:
Komito Analytics at a Glance

Komito Analytics is an enhancement for the most popular web analytics software.

2017-11-25T16:00:00-08:00

Advanced Metrics

Unlock the power of digital analytics with additional insights about visitor's behavior.

  • Social interaction - Tracks social networks events.
  • Form submissions - Tracks submitted forms.
  • Media - Tracks HTML5 video, audio, YouTube and Vimeo players events.
  • Call to actions - Tracks CTA links (mailto, tel, sms, skype, etc).
  • Logged in users - Tracks pageviews by users logged in to social networks.
  • Print - Tracks page print actions.
  • Downloads - Tracks files download links.
  • Outbound links - Tracks outbound links.
  • Scroll - Tracks scroll depth.

Cross-Compatible

Komito Analytics is compatible with most popular web analytics software.

  • Adobe Analytics
  • Baidu Analytics
  • Clicktale
  • Google Analytics
  • Urchin from Google

See integration instruction or Get source code.

Partners

List of Komito Analytics integration and support partners.

  • Analytics Mania
  • Loves Data
  • Webalytics
Privacy is not a question: Komito Analytics does not store any data. Why? Because it's an extension, not a service.

Komito Analytics is subject to the terms and conditions of Apache License 2.0

 

© 2022 Datamart Inc.
item.turbo:content:
Komito Analytics

Komito Analytics is an enhancement for the most popular web analytics software.

Advanced Metrics

Unlock the power of digital analytics with additional insights about visitor's behavior.

  • Social interaction - Tracks social networks events.
  • Form submissions - Tracks submitted forms.
  • Media - Tracks HTML5 video, audio, YouTube and Vimeo players events.
  • Call to actions - Tracks CTA links (mailto, tel, sms, skype, etc).
  • Logged in users - Tracks pageviews by users logged in to social networks.
  • Print - Tracks page print actions.
  • Downloads - Tracks files download links.
  • Outbound links - Tracks outbound links.
  • Scroll - Tracks scroll depth.

Cross-Compatible

Komito Analytics is compatible with most popular web analytics software.

  • Adobe Analytics
  • Baidu Analytics
  • Clicktale
  • Google Analytics
  • Urchin from Google

See integration instruction or Get source code.

Partners:

List of Komito Analytics integration and support partners.

  • La Metrica
  • Loves Data
  • Webalytics
Privacy is not a question: Komito Analytics does not store any data. Why? Because it's an extension, not a service.
